configuration:
<% if @hbase_master -%>
hbase.master <%= @hbase_master %> http://wiki.apache.org/hadoop/Hive/HBaseIntegration
<% end -%>
<% if @hbase_zookeeper_quorum -%>
hbase.zookeeper.quorum <%= @hbase_zookeeper_quorum %> http://wiki.apache.org/hadoop/Hive/HBaseIntegration
<% end -%>
hive.execution.engine <%= @hive_execution_engine %>
<% if @hdfs_uri -%>
fs.defaultFS <%= @hdfs_uri %>
<% end -%>
<%= scope.function_template(['hadoop_hive/metastore_config.erb']) -%>
hive.server2.allow.user.substitution true
hive.server2.enable.doAs true
hive.server2.thrift.port <%= @server2_thrift_port %>
hive.server2.thrift.http.port <%= @server2_thrift_http_port %>
<% if @metastore_uris != "" %>
hive.metastore.uris <%= @metastore_uris %>
<% end %>
hive.security.metastore.authorization.manager org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.security.authorization.StorageBasedAuthorizationProvider
<% if @kerberos_realm != "" %>
hive.server2.authentication KERBEROS
hive.server2.authentication.kerberos.principal hive/_HOST@<%= @kerberos_realm %>
hive.server2.authentication.kerberos.keytab /etc/hive.keytab
hive.metastore.kerberos.principal hive/_HOST@<%= @kerberos_realm %>
hive.metastore.kerberos.keytab.file /etc/hive.keytab
hive.metastore.pre.event.listeners org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.security.authorization.AuthorizationPreEventListener
hive.metastore.sasl.enabled true
<% end %>
